item.title: Ancient Trees
item.description: Three ancient trees, worn and withered over the eons. Silent they stand, siblings from an age long past. Guardians of Elven forests that once covered the realms of men.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Fallen Tree
item.description: Struck down or trampled by some massive beast, the fallen tree serves as a testament to impermanence.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Tree Stump
item.description: These three tree stumps are all that remain of the majestic forest that once covered the landscape.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Tree
item.description: Though dying in a lightning storm long ago, this tree continues to tower over the swampy battleground. A famed blacksmith once tried to cut a branch for the hilt of a greatsword but fell to his death when he attempted to cut into the tree's gnarled bark.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Well
item.description: Gathering water isn't only a necessity, its a social event offering villagers a chance to share tales of adventure and rest during a hard days work. Wells often hide secret passages and hidden treasure, but be careful; danger also lurks within. Artisan Series miniatures offer exceptional detail and quality. We sculpt and place every pebble, brick, board, and shingle by hand.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Barrel
item.description: Whether mead or brandy, these fine oak barrels will store whatever your choice of drink. Also used by smugglers to hide contraband and sometimes even people.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in wood colored PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Chest
item.description: A sturdy chest for coin and valuables. Be careful though; mimics may make their home within. Artisan Series miniatures offer exceptional detail and quality. We sculpt and place every pebble, brick, board, and shingle by hand.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Crate
item.description: These general purpose boxes are good for storing food and items in the market or on long ocean voyages.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in wood colored PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Fountain
item.description: Settlers discovered this ancient stone well bubbling with clear water. It is believed to offer healing properties to thirsty travelers. An enchanted gift from a long lost race.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in grey PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.

item.title: Bench
item.description: Worn smooth from years of feasts, these benches are sturdy though not very comfortable.
item.subdescription: 3D Printed in wood colored PLA, premium 28mm scale miniature.
